original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo andhavane viharati.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapaḥ andhavane viharati

original: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ andhavanaṁ
analyzed: atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇā kevala kappam andhavana

original: obhāsetvā yenāyasmā kumārakassapo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: obhāsetvā yena ayasmā kumārakassapo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṁ kumārakassapaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantam kumārakassapam etat avoca

original: “Bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṁ vammiko rattiṁ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
analyzed: bhikkhu bhikkhu ayam vammikaḥ rattim dhūmāyati divā pajjalati

original: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa laṅgiṁ
Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa uddhumāyikaṁ.
Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa dvidhāpathaṁ.
analyzed: sumedhaḥ sattham ādāya addasa dvidhā patha

original: Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa caṅgavāraṁ.
Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa kummaṁ.
Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa asisūnaṁ.
Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa maṁsapesiṁ.
Abhikkhaṇanto sumedho satthaṁ ādāya addasa nāgaṁ.
‘tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṁ ghaṭṭesi; namo karohi nāgassā’ti.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu nāgaḥ mā nāgam ghaṭṭesi namaḥ karohi nāgassa ati

original: Ime kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, pañhe bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyāsi, yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṁ dhāreyyāsi.
analyzed: ime kho tva bhikkhu pañhe bhagavantam upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyāsi yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti tathā nam dhāreyyāsi

original: Nāhaṁ taṁ, bhikkhu, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā
analyzed: na aham ta bhikkhu passāmi sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā

original: pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo imesaṁ pañhānaṁ veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheyya aññatra
analyzed: pajāya sa deva manussāya yaḥ imesam pañhānam veyyākaraṇena cittam ārādheyya aññatra

original: tathāgatena vā, tathāgatasāvakena vā, ito vā pana sutvā”ti—
analyzed: tathāgatena vā tathāgata sāvakena vā itas vā pana sutvā ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā kumārakassapo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā kumārakassapaḥ tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā

original: “imaṁ, bhante, rattiṁ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ
analyzed: ima bhante rattim aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇā kevalakappa

original: andhavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ
analyzed: andhavanam obhāsetvā yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamanta

original: ṭhitā kho, bhante, sā devatā maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ṭhitā kho bhante sā devatā mam etat avoca

original: ‘bhikkhu bhikkhu, ayaṁ vammiko rattiṁ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati.
analyzed: bhikkhu bhikkhu ayam vammikaḥ rattim dhūmāyati divā pajjalati

original: Ko nu kho, bhante, vammiko, kā rattiṁ dhūmāyanā, kā divā pajjalanā, ko brāhmaṇo,
analyzed: kaḥ nu khalu bhante vammikaḥ kā rattim dhūmāyanā kā divā pajjalanā kaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ

original: ko sumedho, kiṁ satthaṁ, kiṁ abhikkhaṇaṁ, kā laṅgī, kā uddhumāyikā, ko dvidhāpatho,
analyzed: kaḥ sumedhaḥ kim sattha kim abhikkhaṇa kā laṅgī kā uddhumāyikā kaḥ

original: kiṁ caṅgavāraṁ, ko kummo, kā asisūnā, kā maṁsapesi, ko nāgo”ti?
analyzed: kim caṅgavāra kaḥ kummaḥ kā asisūnā kā nāgaḥ ti

original: “‘Vammiko’ti kho, bhikkhu, imassetaṁ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṁ, mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṁsanadhammassa.
analyzed: vammikaḥ ti kho bhikkhu imassa etam cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacana mātā pettika sambhavassa odana kummāsu upacayassa anicca chādana parimaddana bhedana viddhasana dhammassa

original: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, divā kammante ārabbha rattiṁ anuvitakketi anuvicāreti—
analyzed: yam kho bhikkhu divā kammante ārabbha rattim anuvitakketi anuvicāreti

original: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, rattiṁ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojeti kāyena vācāya ‘manasā’—
analyzed: yam kho bhikkhu rattim anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojeti kāyena vācāya manasā

original: ‘Brāhmaṇo’ti kho, bhikkhu, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ iti kho bhikkhu tathāgatassa itam adhivacanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa
sumedhaḥ iti kho bhikkhu sekkhassa etam bhikkhuno
sattham ti kho bhikkhu ariyāya etam paññāya
abhikkhaṇan ti kho bhikkhu vīriya ārambhassa etam adhivacana

original: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
analyzed: abhikkhaṇa sumedha sattham ādāya ati ayam etassa atthaḥ
uddhumāyikā ati kho bhikkhu kodhu upāyāsassa etam adhivacana

original: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
analyzed: abhikkhaṇa sumedha sattham ādāya ati ayam etassa atthaḥ

original: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
analyzed: abhikkhaṇa sumedha sattham ādāya ati ayam etassa atthaḥ

original: ‘Caṅgavāran’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṁ nīvaraṇānaṁ adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: kho bhikkhu pañcannam etam nīvaraṇānam adhivacana
kāmacchanda nīvaraṇassa byāpāda nīvaraṇassa thinamiddha nīvaraṇassa uddhacca kukkucca nīvaraṇassa vicikicchā nīvaraṇassa

original: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
analyzed: abhikkhaṇa sumedha sattham ādāya ati ayam etassa atthaḥ

original: ‘Kummo’ti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: kummaḥ ti kho bhikkhu upādānakkhandhānam adhivacana
rūpa upādāna khandhassa vedanā upādāna khandhassa saññu pādāna khandhassa saṅkhāru pādāna khandhassa viññāṇu pādāna khandhassa
ukkhipa kumma pajaha pañca upādāna khandhe

original: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
analyzed: abhikkhaṇa sumedha sattham ādāya ati ayam etassa atthaḥ

original: cakkhuviññeyyānaṁ rūpānaṁ iṭṭhānaṁ kantānaṁ manāpānaṁ piyarūpānaṁ kāmūpasaṁhitānaṁ rajanīyānaṁ,
analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyānam rūpānam iṭṭhānam kantānam manāpānam piya rūpānam kāma upasahitānam

original: kāyaviññeyyānaṁ phoṭṭhabbānaṁ iṭṭhānaṁ kantānaṁ manāpānaṁ piyarūpānaṁ kāmūpasaṁhitānaṁ rajanīyānaṁ.
analyzed: kāya viññeyyānam phoṭṭhabbānam iṭṭhānam kantānam manāpānam piya rūpānam kāma upasahitānam
ukkhipa asi sūna pajaha pañca kāmaguṇe

original: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
analyzed: abhikkhaṇa sumedha sattham ādāya ati ayam etassa atthaḥ

original: abhikkhaṇa, sumedha, satthaṁ ādāyāti ayametassa attho.
analyzed: abhikkhaṇa sumedha sattham ādāya ati ayam etassa atthaḥ
nāgaḥ iti kho bhikkhu khīṇāsavassa itam bhikkhuno

original: Tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṁ ghaṭṭesi; namo karohi nāgassāti ayametassa attho”ti.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu nāgaḥ mā nāgam ghaṭṭesi namaḥ karohi nāgassa ati ayam etassa atthaḥ ti

original: Attamano āyasmā kumārakassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: atta manaḥ āyasmā kumārakassapaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti
